title: WTB: PWCC Second Chance - T207 Grover Hartley Cycle Back?
author: KMayUSA6060

posts.post_title: WTB: PWCC Second Chance - T207 Grover Hartley Cycle Back?
posts.post_content:
I done messed up, A-A-ron. 

Been out of the game for a bit, and panicked during the auction last night; I didn't put my max bid in right away. I also blame eBay's web page for not refreshing, but I digress. 

Is the winner of the auction on this board, and if so, would you be willing to flip the card? My email is [url]kmayusa6060@gmail.com[/url]
You're just trying to use a loophole so you can say you didn't buy it from PWCC...arent you!!!!!!

[quote name="ullmandds" post=1915992]You're just trying to use a loophole so you can say you didn't buy it from PWCC...arent you!!!!!![/QUOTE]

No but I thought about it after the fact and said to myself, "This could be one helluva silver lining." Haha

Last week I received a PM & email from the person that bought the card, expressing willingness to part with the card. 

Not knowing if they want their name mentioned, I would just like to say a HUGE thank you to them for allowing me to purchase the card from them.
